text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    384692006Intracavitary brachytherapy (procedure)
    113120007Interstitial brachytherapy (procedure)
    384691004Intraluminal brachytherapy (procedure)
    168524008Radiotherapy - intraoperative control (procedure)
    14473006Surface brachytherapy (procedure)
    16560241000119104Oral radionuclide therapy (procedure)
  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/radiotherapy
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    CAV-IMBIntracavitary, Intensity ModulatedA technique of brachytherapy that dynamically directs the radiation into the tumours and away from healthy tissue, for example, by incorporation of metallic shields inside brachytherapy applicators.
  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/umls
    CodeDisplay
    C0203617Intravascular radionuclide therapy

name: BrachytherapyTechniqueVS
title: Brachytherapy Technique Value Set
description: Codes describing the techniques of brachytherapy (internal or surface radiation) procedures.
